root.name: Lizardmen
root.description: Dragonia is in danger! The evil Daimon has awoken and wants his revenge! You must find all the fire emblems by using the special abilities of Doku, Pyro and Flea, three Lizardmen who live on Dragonia. In the game, there are 8 levels, a save system, boss stages and a beautiful shop where you can spend your gold on very useful items!
